Ontologies Class

Ontologies.Rd

The Ontologies class handles calling the BraAPI server and is a wrapper class around httr2 functionality for the Ontology entity

Details

The Ontologies class handles calling the BraAPI server and is a wrapper class around httr2 functionality for the Ontology entity

See also

Other generated: AlleleMatrix, BrAPIClient, BreedingMethods, CallSets, Calls, Crosses, CrossingProjects, Events, GenomeMaps, Germplasm, GermplasmAttributeValues, GermplasmAttributes, Images, Lists, Locations, MarkerPositions, Methods, ObservationUnits, ObservationVariables, Observations, PedigreeNodes, People, PlannedCrosses, Plates, Programs, ReferenceSets, References, Samples, Scales, Seasons, SeedLots, Studies, Traits, Trials, VariantSets, Variants

Methods

Public methods

  • Ontologies$new()

Method new()

Creates a new instance of this R6 class. It is not recommended that this object is created separately from the BrAPIClient

Usage

Ontologies$new(client)

Arguments

client

THe BrAPIClient to be used for server communication

Method get()

Gets a Ontology object by DbId from the BrAPI server

Usage

Ontologies$get(id)

Arguments

id

The DbIid of the Ontology to be returned

Returns

returns a Ontology object by ID.

Method getAll()

Gets a list Ontology objects from the BrAPI server Note the filtering arguments are all optional and can be combined to filter the results The value of the filters an be a single value or a vector of values

Usage

Ontologies$getAll(
  ontologyDbIds = NULL,
  ontologyNames = NULL,
  page = 0,
  pageSize = 1000
)

Arguments

ontologyDbIds

The unique identifier for an ontology definition.

ontologyNames

The human readable identifier for an ontology definition.

page

The page number of results to return, starting from 0

pageSize

The maximum number of results to return per page

Returns

returns a paged and filtered list of Ontology objects.

Method create()

Creates a Ontology object on the BrAPI server.

Usage

Ontologies$create(newValue)

Arguments

newValue

The new Ontology object to be created

Method update()

Creates a Ontology object on the BrAPI server.

Usage

Ontologies$update(value)

Arguments

value

The updated Ontology object to be sent to the server

Method clone()

The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

Usage

Ontologies$clone(deep = FALSE)

Arguments

deep

Whether to make a deep clone.
